section.p: You stand beside the door of the temple as the high priestess draws a bead on you with the sacred bow. The silver arrow glints menacingly in the afternoon sunlight. Then you hear the twang of the string as she shoots.

.
If the total is higher than your Defence, the arrow finds its mark and you lose 1-6 Stamina points (roll a die to see how much).
If the two dice score less than or equal to your Defence, the arrow misses.

Either way, if you survive then you are free to leave.
